title: Print, "Petit Balçon et Suivant, qui de voient a la Facade de la Maison de l'Auteur [Small Balcony and other Grillwork from the Residence of Jean Lamour], pl. 23 in Recueil des Ouvrages de Serrurerier", 1698–1771
medium: Engraving on heavy cream laid paper
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: fait par Lamour Serrurie du Roy; lower right: Nicole fils Sculpe
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, upper right: Pl. 23.; lower center: Petit Balçon et suivant, qui se voient a la Facade de la maison de lauteur.
dimensions:
Sheet: 61 x 45.7 cm (24 x 18 in.)
Platemark: 53.2 x 43.2 cm (20 15/16 in. x 17 in.)
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Grillwork heavily ornamented with scrolls and foliage.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Petit Balçon et Suivant, qui de voient a la Facade de la Maison de l'Auteur [Small Balcony and other Grillwork from the Residence of Jean Lamour], pl. 23 in Recueil des Ouvrages de Serrurerier", 1698–1771.
1698–1771. Engraving on heavy cream laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-210-17.
